A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

D.title: Item Group
D.description: A translation string of an existing group in minecraft to group this block/item under

E.title: Category
E.description: Determines which category this block/item will be placed under in the inventory and crafting table container screens.

F.title: Allow Off Hand
F.description: The allow off hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot

G_use_on_item.title: Allowed Block
G_use_on_item.description: A block descriptor that allows to be placed.

G.title: Block Placer
G.description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.

block.description: Set the placement block name for the planter item.
block.title: Block

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
use_on.title: Use On

I.title: Can Destroy In Creative
I.description: The can destroy in creative component determines if the item will break blocks in creative when swinging.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item can destroy blocks while in creative

J.title: Cooldown
J.description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the `cool down time` setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item.
category.title: Category

duration.description: The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.
duration.title: Duration

BB.title: Damage
BB.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

value.title: Value
value.description: How much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

BC.title: Digger
BC.description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.

use_efficiency.title: Use Efficiency
use_efficiency.description: Toggles if the item will be used efficiently.

BD.title: Display Name
BD.description: Display Name item component. Display Names display the name of an item.
BD.$comment: Does not currently support single value parsing.

value.title: Value
value.description: Set the display name for an item.

BE.title: Durability
BE.description: Durability item component: how much damage can this item take before breaking.

max_durability.title: Maximum Durability
max_durability.description: Maximum durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

BF.title: Enchantable
BF.description: The enchantable component determines what enchantments can be applied to the item.

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry), defaults to false.

BG.title: Entity Placer
BG.description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.

entity.title: Entity
entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

dispense_on.title: Dispense On
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

items.title: Block Descriptor
items.description: Block that item can be dispensed on.

use_on.title: Use On
use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

items.title: Block Descriptor
items.description: Block that item can be used on

BH.title: Food
BH.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

can_always_eat.title: Can Always Eat
can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry), defaults to false.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: How much nutrition does this food item give the player when eaten.

saturation_modifier.title: Saturation Modifier
saturation_modifier.description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when appling the saturation buff. Which happens when you eat the item.

using_converts_to.title: Using Converts To
using_converts_to.description: When used, convert the *this* item to the one specified by `using_converts_to`.

BI.title: Fuel
BI.description: Fuel component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to `cook` other items.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

BJ.title: Glint
BJ.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item has the glint effect.

CA.title: Hand Equipped
CA.description: This component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

value.title: Value
value.description: If the item is rendered like a tool while in hand.

CB.title: Icon
CB.description: The icon item componenent determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

textures.title: Textures
textures.description: Contains key-value pairs of textures used by the item

additionalProperties.title: Texture
additionalProperties.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json `texture_data` object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

default.title: Default Texture
default.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json `texture_data` object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

CC.title: Liquid Clipped
CC.description: The liquid clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

CD.title: Max Stack Size
CD.description: The max stack size component determines how many of the item can be stacked together.

value.title: Value
value.description: How many of the item that can be stacked.

CE.title: Projectile
CE.description: Compels the item shoot, like an arrow.  Pair with minecraft:shooter for dispensers or as ammunition.  Pair with minecraft:throwable to set the entity spawned.

minimum_critical_power.title: Minimum Critical Power
minimum_critical_power.description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.title: Projectile Entity
projectile_entity.description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.

CF.title: Record
CF.description: Used by record items to play music.

comparator_signal.title: Comparator Signal
comparator_signal.description: Signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

sound_event.title: Sound Event
sound_event.description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic.

CH.title: Molang Number
CH.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float.

CG.title: Repairable
CG.description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.

items.title: Items
items.description: Items that can be used to repeair it

use_offhand.title: Use Offhand
use_offhand.description: If ammo can be in offhand

search_inventory.title: Search Inventory
search_inventory.description: If ammo can be stored in the inventory

use_in_creative.title: Use In Creative
use_in_creative.description: If it needs ammo to be used in creative

charge_on_draw.title: Charge On Draw
charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.title: Maximum Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

CJ.title: Should Despawn
CJ.description: Should despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

value.title: Value
value.description: Whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

DA.title: Stacked By Data
DA.description: The stacked by data component determines if the same item with different aux values can stack.

value.title: Value
value.description: Also defines whether the item actors can merge while floating in the world.

DB.title: Tags
DB.description: The tags component determines which tags an item has on it.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

DC.title: Throwable
DC.description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.title: Do Swing Animation
do_swing_animation.description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.title: Launch Power Scale
launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.title: Maximum Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

min_draw_duration.title: Minimum Draw Duration
min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.title: Maximum Launch Power
max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

DD.title: Use Animation
DD.description: This component determines which animation plays when using the item.

value.title: Value
value.description: Which animation to play when using the item.

DE.title: Use Modifiers
DE.description: How long to use before item is done being used.

movement_modifier.title: Movement Modifier
movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

use_duration.title: Use Duration
use_duration.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

protection.description: How much protection does the armor item have.
protection.title: Protection

dispensable.title: Dispensable
dispensable.description: Sets if the item can be dropped by a dispenser block

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: Which equipment slot the item can fit in

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for this item. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

is_experimental.description: If this item is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimental.
is_experimental.title: Is Experimental

menu_category.title: Menu Category
menu_category.description: The Creative Category that includes the specified item.

is_hidden_in_commands.title: Is Hidden In Commands
is_hidden_in_commands.description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Commands can use items by default
